title: Basis of the decision in Brown v Board

content.question: The United States Supreme Court decision in Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka was based on which of the following?

choices.label: The First Amendment’s right to freedom of expression
The Fourteenth Amendment’s due process clause
The Fourteenth Amendment’s guarantee of equal protection
The Fifth Amendment’s power of eminent domain

content.answer: The Fourteenth Amendment’s guarantee of equal protection

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of required Supreme Court cases.
